attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it compulsory for police or LA's to instal visible Speed Clocks at 
100 metres in front of all GATSO or hand held speed cameras to warn drivers of the speed limit rather than prosecute them after the event and to compensate for possible camera errors.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
